transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Ranjit bhai pura free ho gaya tha apan.
Executive: Achcha achcha. Sir dekhiye main na aapko na photo bhej deta hu, theek hai? Hum dono hi milke karte hain, theek hai?
Customer: Aapko main na jo jo product ka naam bhej raha hu na uske photo mujhe aap whatsapp kar do, theek hai? Kal bhai sham tak main aapko sara cheez karke de dunga 95.
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Aapko pura sabka bare mein thodi na pata hai. Aap main agar bata ke nahi dunga to aapko knowledge nahi rahega na uska.
Executive: Nahi to aapka jo missing hai na sir wo product ke naam ka missing hai. Specification sara dala hua hai sir. Theek hai? To jiska specification missing hoga wo main aapse turant whatsapp karunga ki sir iska bata do, sir iska bata do. Aap samajh gaye? Jahan mujhe doubt lagega wo to main puchunga hi. Main bina puche aapka kaise update kar dunga? Ya fir aap ye bolo to kal hum kisi time fir se baith jaye video meeting mein sir.
Customer: Koi dikkat wali baat nahi hai. Sita Ashok ko delete hi kar dijiye isko.
Executive: Kya kar du?
Customer: Ye Sita Ashok karke hai isko pura delete hi kar dijiye.
Executive: Theek hai sir wo main kar deta hu, koi issue nahi.
Executive: Aur kal main kitne baje aapko call karu bataiye?
Customer: Kabhi bhi kar sakte hai aap call, hume koi dikkat nahi hai.
Executive: Theek hai sir to ek baar kal main morning mein aapko connect karta hu proper tarike se, theek hai? Jab tak aaj jitna main kaam kar sakta hu utna aaj main kaam karke ghar nikalta hu. Fir kal main aapko subah mein call karta hu, theek hai sir?
Customer: Baki sab kushal mangal bhaiya?
Executive: Haan sir sab sab theek hai sir.
Customer: Ghar ghar mein maa baba sab log badhiya hai na bhaiya?
Executive: Sab theek hai sir sab theek hai.
Customer: Shadi wadi mana liye bhaiya?
Executive: Nahi nahi nahi.
Customer: Haan theek hai. Theek hai bas kushal mangal rahiyega aap. Theek hai bhaiya.
Executive: Dua hai.
Customer: Hamara to madad jitna ho sake utna karke dijiyega itna.
Executive: 110% sir.
Customer: Jitna ho sake aap se hum ye nahi keh rahe ki aap sab kuch kara do jitna ban sake aap se.
Executive: Nahi nahi 110% sir main utna karunga. Matlab laathi bhi na tute aur saap bhi na mare bas.
Executive: Correct correct sir. Nahi main aapko bol raha na main kal subah mein aapko dobara se call karunga jitna bhi ho sakega main utna aapko kaam karke deta hu subah tak. Theek hai?
Customer: Actually call wagera ka flow bahut gira hua hai na.
Executive: Main dekh liya sir main aapko dekhte hi maine aapke samne hi sara cheez present kiya. Sab kuch maine dekha.
Customer: Aap hum aap humko filhal to ek cheez bata ke do. Abhi hum daily ka basis pe kitna lead consume karega? Do ek hafte mein 44.
Executive: Ek hafte mein 44.
Customer: Matlab pehle to hum teen lead consume karta tha pehle per day. Yes sir teen ya char haan.
Executive: Sir dekhiye isme is package mein aapko jo lead milega ek hafte mein 30 weekly valid milega do daily milega. Ek hafte mein total 44 valid aapko ek hafte mein milega sir.
Customer: Matlab per day ka che kar sakta hai apan aaram se.
Executive: Correct correct correct.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai sir?
Customer: Theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai aap jitna ban sake utna kara ke dijiye aap ha Ranjit bhai.
Executive: Theek hai sir.
Customer: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needs help with product catalog update.

- Wants to delete "Sita Ashok" from catalog.

- Enquires about the number of leads available.

- Expresses concern about low call flow.



Resolution:

- Executive agreed to help with catalog update.

- Executive agreed to delete "Sita Ashok".

- Executive confirmed 44 valid leads per week.

- Executive acknowledged the low call flow.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call the customer next morning.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- catalog, leads, update, delete
